title: I Think It Is Working Now!
content: Oh yes! I think the concept that I was thinking, that building my own CMS into github pages without using any framework is feasible. All I need to do now is to get you guys some tutorial once I finish creating my entries in the carousel of my index page. My plan is to put the top recent three post that i added. I should be able to just pick the last 3 post and display it that way my placeholder is currently showing.
